Description:
The Jewel In The Crown
Those who enjoy entertaining or who seek a relaxed and maintenance free life-style will delight in this stunning warehouse apartment, a unique property in this exclusive boutique development.
The open plan living and dining area opens to two outdoor areas and features a seven metre high soaring glass wall flooding the interior with natural light. Add a huge gourmet kitchen with top spec appliances, two bathrooms and potentially three bedrooms, a mezzanine study with views over parklands, upstairs balcony and ample storage - the list goes on. The property also features secure parking for two cars. Public transport, the delights of the Yarra Parklands and all that the area has to offer are in easy walking distance. Inspect now as this property will be snapped up!
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466
Insights: 1/34 Groom Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2011 and 3 other 3 bedroom unit in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
SO LIGHT, SO WELCOMING!
A meticulous renovation designed to maximise light and space gives this free-standing Edwardian residence the winning edge. On the high side of a picturesque street of well-maintained houses, its picket fence and fretwork-trimmed verandah provide immediate street appeal. The hallway is the first of several surprises – floored in gleaming Baltic pine, with newly-restored plaster cornice work and arch, it has been given highset windows to admit year-round light. Looking down over the street, the spacious main bedroom has a full wall of custom-built wardrobes and plantation shutters. The second and third bedrooms also have built-in wardrobes; one has French doors to the paved area to the side, and access to a vast part-floored attic storage area.
To the right of the hallway, a new fully-tiled bathroom extends into the side light court. The fine proportions of the new rear section of the house are enhanced by a high gabled ceiling; here, a superbly equipped kitchen, with Bosch appliances, Caesarstone and stainless steel benchtops and extensive storage, overlooks the living and dining area, which flows through a wall of multifold doors to the paved north-facing courtyard with ROW car access. A pair of heirloom silky-oak doors opens to the side. Off the living area are a full-size laundry and separate powder room. Featuring fine period detail, ducted heating and split-system airconditioning, this appealing property is close to Clifton Hill Village, schools, transport and Yarra parklands. You won’t be disappointed!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
LUXURY YARRA-EDGE WAREHOUSE LIVING
This expansive high-ceilinged warehouse apartment combines city-fringe convenience with Clifton Hill Village tranquillity and proximity to the vast Yarra Parklands and public transport. Part of a boutique development built within the shell of a red brick industrial building, it offers large light-filled rooms with maximum privacy and security. The apartment opens into a wide vestibule, floored in gleaming hardwood. To one side is the first of three bedrooms, spacious and well-lit, with storage and access to an elegant fully-tiled two-way bathroom. To the rear is an extremely spacious living area and dining area, with a wall of glass to a timber-floored outdoor living zone. Set to one side is the kitchen, superbly fitted with Smeg appliances, pantry, Caesarstone benchtops and glass splashbacks. A timber staircase ascends to the other two double bedrooms (these share a private south-facing balcony & WIR’s), a study space, and a second large bathroom. Including a concealed laundry, generous storage to both levels, reverse-cycle airconditioning, intercom security and premium fittings, this stylish property has a secure garage and car-stacker.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 3 other 3 bedroom unit in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Victorian Terrace Home on Large Land
Enjoying 330 sqm ( approx) of land, this attractive Victorian terrace home with generous light filled living room and garden outlooks is a real find. Comfortable now and with enormous further potential for the creative to explore, accommodation includes two bedrooms with built in robes, study, large open plan living/dining, big kitchen, bathroom, outdoor entertaining area and established garden. Conveniently tucked away close to Yarra Bend Parkland, Darling Gardens, shops, cafes, schools and the train, a great lifestyle investment awaits.
Gary Fitzpatrick : 0437 920 972

Description:
Freestanding and ready to be enjoyed...
Somewhat unique for this inner city pocket of Melbourne, this handsome freestanding late Edwardian offers a little more than you’ll find in most single fronted Victorians...More land, more internal space, more scope to extend and even a lock up garage!
Fully renovated in 2000 the home successfully fuses period charm with modern amenity to create a generously proportioned home of 2 bedrooms (master with en-suite), open plan lounge/dining, formal entry, main bathroom with claw foot bath/separate shower, laundry featuring plenty of storage, well equipped kitchen with island bench, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher.
Located within a delightful pocket of Clifton Hill with acres of Yarra parkland to be enjoyed the home’s many features include polished timber floors, box bay window, leadlight windows, reverse cycle split system, low maintenance front & rear yards and a larger than normal single lock up garage with access from a side laneway.
Insights: 8 Clifton Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2018 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

To Be Offered Separately
The choice of two freestanding brick homes on generous allotments, with off street parking out the front plus ROW at the rear.
Each single fronted home is well presented and offers spacious three bedrooms with lounge, dining, kitchen and central bathroom. Opposite Coulson Reserve and conveniently situated to Merri Creek parklands, bike paths, schools and transport.
The combined land invites possible redevelopment (STCA).

Description:
Exclusive Park & Position
Widely-regarded as the village's premier position directly overlooking parkland, secure an enviable address and savour a sensational inner-city lifestyle with this captivating semi-detached residence nestled in a pretty garden setting on the corner of O'Grady Street. Art Deco elegance and modern enhancements merge throughout this compact yet spacious two-level home with a flexible layout featuring three sizable bedrooms including superb upstairs retreat with ensuite. A delightful private entertainers' garden vista complements living room with high ceiling, classic lounge, casual dining, Smeg/Miele-appointed kitchen, main bathroom, ducted heating, air-conditioning and 3000l raintank. Moments to Queens Parade, trails, trains and schools.
Gary Fitzpatrick : 0437 920 972

Description:
No Expense Has Been Spared
This captivating home in period style features natural timbers with brush box floors and Jarrah staircase, gourmet kitchen with quality European appliances, reverse cycle climate control, intercom alarm system and much more. The location is ideal with the Yarra Parklands just metres away and transport, shops and other amenities all close by. Warm and cosy interiors include, downstairs open plan living and dining areas with kitchen area. Upstairs, three bedrooms (main with walk-in-robe) and luxuriously appointed bathroom. The balcony has city views. Those who enjoy entertaining or who just seek a relaxed and maintenance free lifestyle must inspect this delightful home

Description:
Fields of Green...
The mesmerizing panorama that sweeps across Yarra Bend parkland is a rare inner-city perspective offered by this fabulous tri-level townhouse that delivers an idyllic low-maintenance lifestyle a matter of only kilometres from the CBD. Tightly held for almost 15 years, a gorgeous flowering garden precedes an established, flexible interior which flows to a sunny and secluded courtyard garden with seat storage and prized off-street parking. Includes three big bedrooms (second level with dormer study nook), built-in-robes, separate living and dining rooms, well-appointed kitchen, large bathroom, powder room, European laundry, ducted heating, air-conditioning and great storage. Stroll to cafes, shops, sporting fields, trails, schools and trains. No body corporate fees. Scope to cosmetically improve if desired.
Stefan Dzanovski : 0404 828 723

Description:
Wellington House Circe 1883
This majestic property was built by former Acting Premier of Victoria George David Langridge, a man who forged a career in Victorian politics and championed the cause of the working classes having started as a carpenter and trying his luck in the goldfields.
In 1923 the property became a convent to the Sisters of Charity with a foundation stone commemorating its opening by Archbishop Mannix.
This faded gem is in need of substantial renovation and refurbishment to restore it to its former lustrous glory with its grand entry to two spectacularly large interconnecting drawing rooms that once would have seen grand balls.
Upstairs has seven rooms plus a bathroom built over the driveway and a 2nd maids stair to the kitchen, with four large rooms downstairs. There is a coachman’s cottage/stable at the rear and a sumptuous quantity of land to the house’s east.
Sitting on approximately 18,000sq.ft (1670m2) directly opposite Darling Gardens with commanding views across the treetops to the city skyline this home will again become a showpiece in the area.
NOTE: On auction day property will be open from 10:20am and close pormptly at 10:50am allowing 10 minutes to clear property prior to auction.
Insights: 12 North Terrace, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2010 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Victorian Class, Contemporary Chic
A stylish, meticulous renovation highlights this immaculate, two bedroom Victorian, city-fringe terrace uniting contemporary open plan living so favoured today with graceful features of yesteryear. A sunlit open living, dining and deluxe kitchen provides quality appliances, generous cabinetry and gleaming Caesarstone bench tops, and also accesses an appealing rear courtyard with a desirable northerly aspect.
Two bedrooms host open fireplaces, including one offering built-in robes and storage cupboards.
You will also find a pristine central bathroom, European/laundry, hydronic heating and a rear right of way. The CBD is approx. 5 kilometres away and you can stroll to transport, school, Darling Gardens, popular Merri Creek walking trails and shops. Eastern Freeway access and popular Yarra Bend Park and Boathouse Restaurant nearby.
Al Bogdani : 0413 342 720

Seconds to highly sought-after lifestyle attractions such as Yarra Bend parkland, cafes, trains and schools; immediately enjoy the elegantly-proportioned spaces of this fine timber home that offers further scope if desired to improve and extend up (STCA). Includes two double bedrooms (built-in-robes, bay window), formal dining room, living room (gas log heater), Smeg-equipped Blackwood kitchen, bathroom with clawfoot tub and laundry facilities, air-conditioning, polished floorboards and covered rear deck.

Description:
More affordable than you’d think…
Located on the upper floor of this select block of only 6 apartments is one of the more affordable 2 bedroom apartments that you’ll find in this delightful inner city suburb. Fronting Fenwick Street with its majestic Plane Trees providing a pleasant outlook this apartment is currently leased until January 2011 and would make an ideal ongoing investment or first home.
Although comfortable as is, the apartment is currently a little tired and would benefit from a cosmetic refurbishment to enhance its sizeable floor plan which offers built in robes in each of the 2 bedrooms, updated kitchen/meals, spacious lounge, tiled bathroom with laundry facilities and separate toilet. Features include security entry, off street car space on title and of course an envied location walking distance to the delights of the Clifton Hill Village, Queens Parade, Yarra Parklands and a host of public transport options.
Insights: 5/79 Heidelberg Road, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
A great home at a genuine asking price…
This handsome semi-detached Victoria terrace was renovated and extended in 2002 creating a charming home which you can enjoy immediately within this quiet pocket of Clifton Hill. The home features a rear northerly aspect and comprises 2 sizeable bedrooms with built in robes, formal lounge, informal living/dining, bi-fold door access to a low maintenance tiled courtyard, modern kitchen with quality appliances including dishwasher and filtered drinking water tap, tiled bathroom with heated towel rack and European laundry. Quality fittings and fixtures include period cast iron fireplaces with timber mantels, split system air conditioning, gas heating, video intercom system, built in ironing station, rear laneway access and handy rear storage cupboard.

Description:
Comfortable & Spacious 1 Bedroom
Located within one of the best maintained apartment blocks in Clifton Hill, this ground floor single bedroom apartment enjoys a bright Northerly aspect and is walking distance to a myriad of public transport options, acres of beautiful parkland and the delightful Queens Parade shopping strip.
Offering a wonderful entry level opportunity for the first home buyer or investor the apartment features large North facing lounge with adjoining kitchen, sizeable bedroom with built in robes, tiled bathroom with laundry facilities and undercover car space. Secure tenancy in place until September 2010 returning $ 240.00 per week.

Description:
FORTHCOMING AUCTION: Sure to Impress!
Lovely 2 bedroom apartment with park views
Open plan living/dining with heating
Front elevated courtyard
Modern kitchen with ample storage space
Central bathroom with separate toilet
Generous bedrooms, both with BIRs
Rear courtyard with access to courtyard
Single car space
Located opposite Ramsden Reserve and Yarra Parklands, this well designed 2 bedroom apartment will satisfy the fussiest of buyers. With two courtyards, large light filled living area, spacious bedrooms and private off street car parking combined with a convenient and peaceful location, this is the perfect package.
Accommodation: Bright open plan living and dining area with heating and floor to ceiling windows, elevated front courtyard perfect for entertaining family and friends or relaxing with a tranquil backdrop, modern kitchen with ample bench and cupboard space, central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry facilities including clothes dryer, two generous bedrooms, both with built in wardrobes - the master with access to private rear courtyard.
Features: Under cover car parking and use of recreational facilities, including an outdoor leisure pool and BBQ.
Steven Ly : 0407 620 261

FORTHCOMING AUCTION
Situated in a well established boutique development this peaceful and private parcel of land is well positioned having sweeping city views from Hall Reserve just around the corner
* Land comes with council approved plans & permit

* Great opportunity to build your own home so close to the CBD

Description:
INNER CITY SUCCESS MADE SIMPLE
Totally transformed and stylishly extended rather than merely renovated, this exceptional inner city home delivers three bedrooms and two bathrooms in addition to a cool, contemporary living/dining domain with a desirable indoor-outdoor emphasis.
A quiet, convenient non-thoroughfare adjacent to Darling Gardens and Clifton Hill Primary School provides the perfect context for instant enjoyment and offers easy access to the CBD as well as Queens Parade cafes and Fitzroy's eclectic shopping
An allotment slightly wider than usual for the inner city complements the pleasing first impressions created by a pretty period facade.
Immediately, a welcoming hall with Tasmanian Myrtle floors establishes a stylish tone for two downstairs double bedrooms sharing a sky-lit contemporary bathroom. Upstairs the main bedroom is accompanied by walk-in robes and en suite and takes in some inner city lights, including those of the MCG
The inviting living/dining domain opens to dual decks and an elegantly efficient courtyard while an open-plan kitchen is equipped with stone surfaces and an island bench.
The decks, one facing east, the other south, enhance entertaining options and precede an attractively maintained courtyard that concludes with a right of way that would facilitate off street parking if so desired.
Central heating, refrigerated cooling, under-floor heating in bathrooms, smart wiring for data, TV and cable add further lustre to a polished inner city performance!
Glenn Bartlett : 0418 337 710
Insights: 11 Page Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
RENOVATERS DELIGHT
This solid brick, single front terrace presents a wonderful opportunity for transformation, taking advantage of its size, potential and central position. Comfortable as is, it could be updated and reconfigured to create a fabulous family home. Featuring good size bedrooms with OFP's, arched hallway, formal lounge, kitchen/meals, floor boards, north facing rear yard and ROW access. Local amenities include walking distance to Clifton Hill Train station, MCG, Yarra Bend Park and the Eastern Freeway.
Thomson (Carlton and Brunswick) Pty Ltd
Jason Sharpe : 0438 847 700
